mapper.update: UPDATE db_staff SET name=#{name}, sex=#{sex}, age=#{age} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE db_staff sta db_department dp SET sta.departmentID=#{id} WHERE sta.id=#{id} AND dp.departmentName=#{departmentName}
mapper.select: SELECT d.id did,d.department_name departmentName,d.remarks,s.id sid,s.`name` staffName,s.sex staffSex,s.age staffAge from db_department d LEFT JOIN db_staff s ON d.id=s.departmentID WHERE s.age>#{age}
SELECT s.name, s.sex, s.age FROM db_staff s
